questionTitle: Good ________! I hope you win.
The police-officer asked us what ________ doing.
She decided to go to the enquiry desk ________ out when her train left.
The Home-Loan Company ________ the right to cancel this agreement.
Just as we were sitting down for the picnic it ________ began to rain.
I had run out of money but luckily I was able to ________ enough to get home.
All students leaving college at the end of term must leave their addresses so that letters can be sent ________.
My mother was ________ of making a cake when the front door bell rang.
Could you be more specific about what is ________ in this particular job?
From the hotel there is a good ________ of the mountains.
________ the weather forecast it will rain heavily later this morning.
She heated the chocolate until it ________, then poured it over the cake.
Diana ________ over a stone and fell flat on her face.
I have been looking for this book for months, and ________ I have found it.
Children remain dependent ________ their parents for a long time.
Jones was dismissed ________ the firm.
The continents have been drifting slowly ________.
We'll have to call the doctor. The baby is ________.
He said that the plane had already left and that I ________ arrived an hour earlier.
Mrs Black is ________ her holiday with friends in the country.
